chart_description: This chart displays the active threads in different processes running on a Windows operating system. It shows the total number of threads for each process, distributed among various dimensions.

dimension_descriptions.Idle: The number of threads being utilized for idle processes.
dimension_descriptions.LogonUI: The number of threads being utilized by the Windows Logon User Interface (UI) process.
dimension_descriptions.Microsoft.ActiveDirectory.WebServices: The number of threads being utilized by Microsoft Active Directory Web Services.
dimension_descriptions.MsMpEng: The number of threads being utilized by Microsoft Malware Protection Engine.
dimension_descriptions.NisSrv: The number of threads being utilized by Network Inspection System Service.
dimension_descriptions.Registry: The number of threads being utilized by the Registry process.
dimension_descriptions.SMSvcHost: The number of threads being utilized by the Service Management process.
dimension_descriptions.SecurityHealthService: The number of threads being utilized by Windows Security Health Service.
dimension_descriptions.System: The number of threads being utilized by the System process.
dimension_descriptions.WMSvc: The number of threads being utilized by Web Management Service.
dimension_descriptions.WmiApSrv: The number of threads being utilized by the WMI Performance Adapter Service.
dimension_descriptions.WmiPrvSE: The number of threads being utilized by Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) Provider Host Service.
dimension_descriptions.amazon-ssm-agent: The number of threads being utilized by Amazon EC2 Simple Systems Manager (SSM) Agent Service.
dimension_descriptions.conhost: The number of threads being utilized by Console Host process.
dimension_descriptions.csrss: The number of threads being utilized by the Client Server Runtime Subsystem process.
dimension_descriptions.dfsrs: The number of threads being utilized by Distributed File System Replication Service.
dimension_descriptions.dfssvc: The number of threads being utilized by Distributed File System Service.
dimension_descriptions.dns: The number of threads being utilized by Domain Name System (DNS) Service.
dimension_descriptions.dwm: The number of threads being utilized by Desktop Window Manager Service.
dimension_descriptions.fontdrvhost: The number of threads being utilized by Font Driver Host Service.
dimension_descriptions.ismserv: The number of threads being utilized by Intersite Messaging Service.
dimension_descriptions.lsass: The number of threads being utilized by Local Security Authority Subsystem Service.
dimension_descriptions.mqsvc: The number of threads being utilized by Message Queuing Service.
dimension_descriptions.msdtc: The number of threads being utilized by Microsoft Distributed Transaction Coordinator Service.
dimension_descriptions.services: The number of threads being utilized by Services and Controller app.
dimension_descriptions.smss: The number of threads being utilized by Session Manager Subsystem.
dimension_descriptions.spoolsv: The number of threads being utilized by Print Spooler Service.
dimension_descriptions.sppsvc: The number of threads being utilized by Software Protection Service.
dimension_descriptions.ssm-agent-worker: The number of threads being utilized by AWS Systems Manager Agent Service worker process.
dimension_descriptions.svchost: The number of threads being utilized by Host Process for Windows Services.
dimension_descriptions.vds: The number of threads being utilized by Virtual Disk Service.
dimension_descriptions.windows_exporter: The number of threads being utilized by Windows Prometheus Exporter.
dimension_descriptions.wininit: The number of threads being utilized by Windows Initialization process.
dimension_descriptions.winlogon: The number of threads being utilized by Windows Logon process.
